channel.title: Life on Han Xiao
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Han Xiao

item.title: Hello World
item.description: “Hello World” My blog is officially launched. This is the first time I built a website from stretch. I didn’t think much when I decided not to use a blog builder. For one, I don’t want to pay the fee. For two, WordPress is blocked by the GFW. The level of difficulty was unexpected. It took me a whole week to get it up there. I’m having a two week
